short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Surf Sage is a Chrome extension that integrates GPT-based AI models directly into your browsing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Surf Sage is your intelligent browsing companion, powered by advanced AI models. This Chrome extension seamlessly integrates with your browser, allowing you to interact with GPT-based AI while you surf the web. Here are some key features:

- AI-Powered Assistance: Ask questions about the content you're viewing and receive intelligent, context-aware responses.
- Multiple AI Models: Choose from a variety of AI models, including OpenAI's GPT models, Anthropic's Claude, and local models.
- Customizable Settings: Easily switch between different AI providers and models to suit your needs.
- Side Panel Interface: A sleek, retro-inspired chat interface that doesn't interfere with your browsing experience.
- Chat History: Keep track of your conversations and easily revisit previous chats.
- Context-Aware Responses: The AI takes into account the current webpage content to provide more relevant answers.
- Markdown Support: Responses are rendered in markdown, allowing for rich text formatting.
- Code Highlighting: Proper syntax highlighting for code snippets in responses.
- Keyboard Shortcuts: Quickly access the extension's features with customizable keyboard shortcuts.
- Privacy-Focused: Your conversations are stored locally in your browser.

Whether you're a student researching complex topics, a professional seeking quick insights, or just a curious web surfer, Surf Sage enhances your browsing experience by putting the power of AI at your fingertips. Dive deeper into web content, get instant explanations, and explore ideas more efficiently with Surf Sage.
